title: Where Dreams Come True!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 725 Sq.
Just minutes from everything, major bus line,including major shopping centers, restaurants, banking and business centers.
All with in walking distance from our community.

The apartments at Bower Village are comfortable, quality homes and just right for you in mind with linen closet in bathrooms, hall closet for coats, large storage off the patio and full size side by side washer and dryer, and one covered carport parking included.. Contemporary and stylish, and fully equipped with worry-free appliances, green- energy saving upgrades, wood-burning fireplace with beautiful mantel and ceiling fan in dinning room.
Our community also offers a large pool, fitness center and resident lounge.
We are located in the renowned Kent School District!
Come by, email, or call us today.
Our friendly staff would love to assist you in finding the perfect new home.
Fireplace, Disposal, Full Size Washer/Dryer, 9 Foot Ceilings*, Window Coverings, Refrigerator, Large Closets, Dishwasher

Package Room in Progress, New Fitness Center Under Construction, Available Transportation, Storage Space, On-site Maintenance, Gated, Courtesy Patrol, High Speed Internet, New Dog Park, On-site Management, Pool
Rottweilers, Cane Corsos, Italian Mastiffs, Pit Bulls, Staffordshire Terriers, Doberman Pinchers and Wolves
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
